business.title: For Businesses
business.features_1: Access high-quality audiences: reach daily active users including business owners, office workers, online sellers, and content creators.
business.features_2: +~15% approval rate: real demand profiles from verified customers generated directly inside SaaS platforms.
business.features_3: Pay per result (CPDeal): costs only occur when customers are approved or successfully disbursed. Save ~20% in cost and time compared to traditional social ads.

saas.title: For SaaS Platforms
saas.features_1: Increase revenue per user: earn revenue-sharing commissions from Xpromo when users are approved and successfully funded.
saas.features_2: Improve users’ ability to pay: financially supported users are more willing and able to upgrade or continue paying for your SaaS services.
saas.features_3: Extend user lifetime value (LTV): additional budget enables users to purchase more services, driving long-term SaaS profitability.

user.title: For End Users
user.features_1: Easy access to funding: working capital, credit cards, or cash funds available exactly when needed.
user.features_2: Better interest rates: products provided by trusted financial institutions and banks with more favorable rates than informal or high-risk funding sources.
user.features_3: Fast digital processing: fully online experience from application to verification and approval.
